snippet: Players often have to forfeit because they exceed the time limit imposed to keep games from running too long.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on how time limits affect game play; observes that Vassily Ivanchuk of Ukraine has run into the problem twice in recent months, losing four games by running out of time.
lead_paragraph: Players often have to forfeit because they exceed the time limit imposed to keep games from running too long.

headline.print_headline: Keeping Eyes on the Clock As Well as the Board
headline.seo: Keeping Eyes on the Clock as Well as the Board
headline.main: Keeping Eyes on the Clock as Well as the Board
